transcript:
the clearer your affirmation the easier
it is for you to understand for you to
know what you're shooting for so you can
see it better and the easier for your
mind to start to think about visualize
and work towards it and so what you
really want to do is you want to
identify a goal or a positive belief or
whatever it is that you want to instill
into yourself then you want to frame it
in the present tense as if it's
happening right now and then you want to
make sure it's extremely specific so you
can visualize it vividly which we're
going to talk about because if you can
bring in Vis if you can bring in
positive affirmations and visualization
that's like gas on a fire
